```
sudo xbps-install gtk4-devel libadwaita-devel pkg-config
```

title: Can't see bottom of expanded menu on mobile
body:
Using Safari on iPhone 14:

1. Visit the docs
2. Expand hamburger menu
3. Expand Help
4. I can tell there are more items in the help list, but the menu/page won't scroll.

title: Print stylesheet
body: We should support a print stylesheet so that printing is usable. Printing may be super outdated in many circles but I still very frequently print to PDF for use on an eReader, especially docs. :)

title: Respect `prefers-reduce-motion` for the splash screen ghost animation
body: If the user prefers reduced motion (via the `prefers-reduce-motion` media query) we should instead show a freeze frame of the ghost animation (i.e. not let it animate at all).
author: pluiedev

comments.body: Agree. This can probably be prioritized after the 1.0, but will accept a PR if someone does it in the mean time.
This is already done, issue should be closed.
Thought the PR tagged this. It was just done. Thanks!
